events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving a rear-end collision with another vehicle, requesting claim initiation.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' following the review of submitted accident details and police report.
Assigned claims agent to manage the case and establish communication with the claimant for further processing.
Acknowledged receipt of claim and informed the customer about the next steps and estimated timeline for resolution.
Requested additional documents from the customer including photos of damage, police report, and repair estimates.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including detailed photos and official police report promptly.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacted involved parties to verify accident details.
Investigation concluded confirming liability on the other party and estimating the damage costs accurately.
Proposed a settlement amount covering damages and rental car expenses, communicated to the claimant for approval.
Received positive feedback from the customer appreciating the timely communication and proposed settlement offer.
Claim officially approved following the customer's acceptance of the settlement proposal without any objections.
Processed payment to the customer for the approved settlement covering vehicle repairs and associated costs.
Closed the claim after confirming receipt of payment and satisfaction from the customer on the resolution.
Archived the completed claim record for future reference and compliance with company data retention policies.
